bonus: HP is increased by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32%. When current HP increases or decreases, Charged Attack DMG will be increased by 14%/18%/22%/26%/30% for 4s. Max 3 stacks. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s. When the character has 3 stacks or a third stack's duration refreshes, 8/9/10/11/12 Energy will be restored. This Energy restoration effect can be triggered once every 12s.
description: A manual that was once passed down from generation to generation within an underwater priory. Today, none know of its existence.
name: Tome of the Eternal Flow

refinementRaw.name: Aeon Wave
